articles.title: Congo and rebels sign declaration of principles for a permanent ceasefire : NPR
articles.description: Congo and Rwanda-backed rebels on Saturday signed a declaration of principles in Qatar to end fighting in eastern Congo that commits them to a permanent ceasefire to be signed in one month.
articles.content:
Congo and Rwanda-backed rebels sign declaration of principles for permanent ceasefire
